messages.message:
:soc2: :jenkins_devil: as part of the SOC2 compliance effort, we've launched prod.jenkins.instabase.com (http://prod.jenkins.instabase.com), this is an instance dedicated to release-related jobs, and we've started migrating the following jobs over there from jenkins.instabase.com (http://jenkins.instabase.com)
1. :white_check_mark: certify-all and certify-release
2. :construction: deploy-prod, dogfood, release sandboxes, and UAT
3. :crystal_ball: SaaS/PaaS product deployment jobs
By default, `engineering team should have read-only access to this instance now via` :okta: (look for the Jenkins prod Chiclet) for debugging purposes. Jobs will be managed by the release team and prod eng team.

The only direct impact at the moment is that *`all release certify needs to be requested in #certify-release and be conducted by release engineering or prod eng team`*

once we complete the migration we will open up write permissions in jenkins.instabase.com (http://jenkins.instabase.com)
questions or comments, please feel free to post to <#C035SLYCJ9X|>
